smartCampus.title: Smart Campus Platform
smartCampus.excerpt: Digital infrastructure to modernise student services and campus operations.
smartCampus.description: A modular platform for campus services including room booking, events, maintenance requests, and dynamic campus maps. I led the frontend architecture with React, built reusable interface patterns, and collaborated with a cross-faculty team to align technical decisions with student needs.

wellbeing.title: Wellbeing Insights Dashboard
wellbeing.excerpt: Data visualisation toolkit for monitoring student wellbeing trends.
wellbeing.description: Designed to help counsellors and mentors react quickly to wellbeing signals. I integrated real-time updates with Firebase, crafted compassionate UI states, and ensured data anonymity following university regulations.

techEvents.title: Tech Community Events
techEvents.excerpt: Open-source hub for organising university tech meetups and workshops.
techEvents.description: An event discovery and management tool that empowers student clubs to promote sessions, gather feedback, and reuse resources. Includes multilingual landing pages, analytics dashboards, and a motion-rich onboarding experience.

about.title: Building inclusive digital experiences with heart
about.description: I am a second-year Software Engineering student at Zhytomyr Polytechnic State University, fascinated by how technology can accelerate education and community impact.

story.heading: From curiosity to craftsmanship
story.paragraph1: My journey into software engineering began with curiosity about how interfaces are built. This curiosity turned into a drive to craft products that feel effortless and delightful across devices and languages.
story.paragraph2: Today I focus on React ecosystems, clean architecture, and motion design. I enjoy facilitating team workshops, documenting patterns, and mentoring first-year students through code reviews.
